impressum.title: Impressum
impressum.intro_text: is a localized online platform that allows citizens to report issues in municipal infrastructure via an interactive map. Users can easily and quickly report municipal issues such as damaged roads, overflowing containers, streetlight malfunctions, and similar problems. The goal of the website is to improve communication between local community residents and municipal services, facilitating the quick resolution of reported issues.
impressum.disclaimer_text: allows users to report issues in the public interest but is not responsible for the accuracy of reported information. All reports are subject to verification by the competent municipal services. E-SEO TEAM is not responsible for delays or failure to address reports by municipal services.
impressum.copyright_text: The content, design, and concept of the website are protected by copyright and are the property of E-SEO TEAM. Any copying, downloading, or reproduction of content without permission is prohibited.
impressum.privacy_text: processes data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act. Personal data collected through reports is used exclusively for processing the report and will not be shared with third parties, except in cases prescribed by law.
impressum.legal_text: E-SEO TEAM regularly updates the website content and reserves the right to change information on this page at any time without prior notice.

register.title: Create an Account
register.haveaccount_text: Already have an account? Log In
register.user_notice: Your personal data will be protected and will not be publicly displayed on the platform or included in your official reports to the authorities.

problems.add_problem_notification_1: Click on the map to select the location of the issue you are reporting or choose your current location.
problems.add_problem_notification_2: Please check if the issue has already been reported before submitting a new report. Thank you.

details.status_official: The report has been sent to the relevant authorities via email and cannot be modified afterwards!

add.headline: Report an Issue
add.add_success: The issue has been successfully created and is awaiting administrator approval.
add.add_error: An error occurred while creating the issue.

edit.headline: Edit Issue Details
edit.edit_succes_2: The issue has been successfully updated.
edit.edit_error: An error occurred while updating the issue.

delete.delete_error: An error occurred while removing the issue.

formular.title: Enter Issue Title
formular.official_email: Send an email to the relevant authorities. (Please double-check the details before submitting. Changes are not possible later.)
formular.add_image_explination: However, adding a photo along with the issue description will greatly assist the authorities in resolving the reported issue more efficiently.

images.max_upload_file_size: The maximum allowed image size is 10MB.
images.file_type_alowed: The image must be in JPG or PNG format.

users.account_delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the account.

prompt.prompt_user_delete_intro: Brisanjem naloga obrisaćete TRAJNO i sve Vaše prijave!
prompt.prompt_leave_question: Da li zaista želite da odustanete?

restrictAccess: You do not have permission to access this page!
enable_location: Enable location settings and reload the page to select your current location.
location_not_available: Location is not available. Please try again.
location_request_timed_out: Location request timed out. Please try again.
location_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
offline_mode: You are in offline mode. Please check your internet connection.
session_expired: Your session has expired! Please log in again!
wrong_password_forgot: An error occurred while resetting the password. Please try again.
wrong_password_reset: An error occurred while requesting a password reset.
wrong_login: An error occurred while logging in. Please try again.
wrong_logout: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.
wrong_register: An error occurred while creating the account.
